item.title: Former OpenAI researcher and whistleblower found dead at age 26
item.description: Suchir Balaji, a former OpenAI researcher, was found dead in his San Francisco apartment in recent weeks, officials confirmed to CNBC.

item.title: Apple and Google instructed by House committee to prepare to dump TikTok next month
item.description: House members are telling Apple and Google to be prepared to comply with a law that could result in TikTok facing an effective ban in the U.S.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield tops 4.4% as investors focus on the Fed’s rate decision
item.description: The benchmark 10-year Treasury yield moved higher on Friday as investors look ahead to the Federal Reserve's final meeting of the year.

item.title: OpenAI emails show Elon Musk wanted for-profit structure in 2017
item.description: OpenAI on Friday posted screenshots showing that Elon Musk, one of its co-founders, pushed for the company to have a for-profit structure as far back ...

item.title: The Federal Reserve’s final meeting of 2024 will set the tone for markets heading into year-end — and beyond
item.description: A dovish tilt in the central bank's "dot plot" next week could give the year-end rally, which has stumbled this week, one more push.
